import 'dart:async';

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

void main() {
  runApp(MyApp());
}

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp(
      home: SplashScreen(),
    );
  }
}

class SplashScreen extends StatefulWidget {
  @override
  _SplashScreenState createState() => _SplashScreenState();
}

class _SplashScreenState extends State<SplashScreen> {
  @override
  void initState() {
    super.initState();
    Timer(
      Duration(seconds: 5),
      () {
        Navigator.pushReplacement(
          context,
          MaterialPageRoute(builder: (context) => SecondPage()),
        );
      },
    );
  }

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('NewSphere'),
      ),
      body: Container(
        decoration: BoxDecoration(
          image: DecorationImage(
            image: NetworkImage(
                // 'https://img.freepik.com/premium-photo/cute-cat-with-christmas_931878-35699.jpg'),
                'https://e0.pxfuel.com/wallpapers/522/648/desktop-wallpaper-cartoon-christmas-cat-meowy-christmas.jpg'),
            fit: BoxFit.cover, // adjust the BoxFit property as needed
          ),
        ),
        child: Stack(
          children: [
            Positioned(
              top: 16, // Adjust this value as needed
              left: 100, // Adjust this value as needed
              child: Text(
                'Merry Catmas :3',
                style: TextStyle(
                  fontSize: 24,
                  color: Colors.black,
                ),
              ),
            ),
            Positioned(
              bottom: 16, // Adjust this value as needed
              left: 113, // Adjust this value as needed
              child: Text(
                'NIT Agartala',
                style: TextStyle(
                  fontSize: 24,
                  color: Colors.black,
                ),
              ),
            ),
            Positioned(
              top: 70,
              left: 124,
              child: Image.network(
                'https://cdn.dribbble.com/users/31864/screenshots/3666062/free_logos_dribbble_ph.jpg', // Replace with your image link
                width: 120,
                height: 120,
                fit: BoxFit.contain,
              ),
            ),
            Positioned(
              top: 170, // Adjust this value as needed
              left: 120, // Adjust this value as needed
              child: Text(
                'NewSphere',
                style: TextStyle(
                  fontSize: 24,
                  color: Colors.black,
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}

class SecondPage extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('Welcome :)'),
      ),
      body: Container(
        decoration: BoxDecoration(
          image: DecorationImage(
            image: NetworkImage(
                'data:image/jpeg;base64,'),
            fit: BoxFit.cover, // adjust the BoxFit property as needed
          ),
        ),
        child: Center(
          child: Text(
            'Welcome to NIT Agartala',
            style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 28,
                color: Colors.black), // adjust font size and color
          ),
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}
